SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.Socket.VirtualSocket

Class VirtualViewSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.Socket.VirtualSocket.VirtualViewSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeartBeatInterface, VirtualView, ViewInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class VirtualViewSocket extends Object implements VirtualView
This class runs on the server, and it represents the view on the server. Each action that the view can do is translated into a message sent to the client.
See Also:
